content: the rustic summer tee is so named as the texture reminds me of garden trellises woven rattan simple summer pleasures and spending time outdoors this tee is beginner friendly as it is made in 2 panels and seamed together - no increases or decreases to worry about ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **buy more and save ** cannot be combined with other offers excludes bundles/ebooks * save 15% on the purchase of 3 or more patterns with code happystitching15 * save 20% on the purchase of 5 or more patterns with code happystitching20 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ the pattern for this tee can also be found for free on my blog here 1 this pattern is written in english using us terminology and most sizes have been tested by others if you are a 4x 56-58 inch bust or 5x 60-62 inch bust and would like to test this pattern please contact me at fromnicolescreations@gmail com 2 **skill level ** advanced beginner skills used working in turned row single_crochet half_double_crochet herringbone half_double_crochet 3 decreases seaming **materials ** * yarn 530-1490 yards of dk/#3 yarn * hook i/5 5mm **included sizes ** xs 28 inch through 5xl 62 inch bust based on craft yarn council sizing tee is designed with 2-4 inches of positive ease around the bust **stay in touch ** for updates behind the scenes content discounts and to see what i m working on *instagram * @fromnicolescreations 4 *email list exclusive discounts on all new releases * https //fromnicolescreations myflowdesk com/signup 5 *blog * https //www fromnicolescreations com 6 if you have any questions or concerns please feel free to reach me at fromnicolescreations@gmail com 7 please share your work with hashtags #fromnicolescreations and #rusticsummertee or #rusticsummercollection and don t forget to add your project to ravelry i want to see what you make this pattern and photos are copyright of nicole j berzins of from nicole s creations they may not be altered copied shared or resold in any way finished products made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities in local and online sales however you must use your own product photos when selling completed projects or when posting finished products on social media pattern credit must be given to @fromnicolescreations pattern and photos cannot be used for resale purposes 1 https //fromnicolescreations
